title: Blended Learning-Based Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program

context.additional_context: Job-integrated mathematics education program in a smartphone-centric constrained technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can complete two weekly math modules (e.g., function graph interpretation, statistics fundamentals) using modular self-directed learning strategies in a blended learning environment.
Learners can demonstrate 80%+ accuracy in solving geometric problems in three-dimensional space through VR simulations.
Learners can complete math projects (e.g., data analysis reports) incorporating peer evaluation and feedback using online collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
